summary: Most frontend UI requirements for homepage, results page, client-side filtering, URL query reflection, and a coherent theme appear implemented. However, the diff does not show the required generated image assets being added under frontend/public/assets/generated. Several unrelated authentication/backend/react-query utilities were added that were not requested.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add the generated static images to the frontend as assets under frontend/public/assets/generated and render them in the UI.
missing_requirements.reason: UI references the generated images by path, but the diff summary does not show any files added under frontend/public/assets/generated, so the required assets are not evidenced as present.

hallucinated_features.description: Internet Identity authentication provider and related identity/actor hooks
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest explicitly lists user accounts/authentication as a non-goal; these auth-related hooks/providers were added anyway.

hallucinated_features.description: React Query client setup and placeholder backend query hooks
hallucinated_features.reason: No requirement asks for backend data fetching/state management; results are supposed to be local mock data filtered client-side.
BuildRequest is frontend-focused and explicitly says images must not be served via backend; adding a backend actor is not requested.
Not requested in requirements and adds extra outbound link content to the UI.
